featured.text: Other groundbreaking products, including Omega-3 capsules, cold virus pretreatment sprays, and dog snacks are made from what was once cod catch detritus.

definition.zh_def: 碎屑，殘留物，特別是指自然界或生物體的殘骸。
definition.en_def: Waste or debris that results from the disintegration or destruction of something.
definition.example: After the storm, the beach was covered in detritus from the ocean.
